com.nanosim.client
Class ContentWidget

java.lang.Object

                      com.nanosim.client.ContentWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.SelectionHandler<java.lang.Integer>, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, java.lang.Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CwAnimation, CwCookies, CwFlexTable, CwFrame, CwGrid, CwInbox
public abstract class ContentWidget
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.LazyPanel
implements com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.SelectionHandler<java.lang.Integer>

A widget used to show GWT examples in the ContentPanel. It includes a tab bar with options to view the example, view the source, or view the css style rules.

This Widget extends LazyPanel so that the content is not rendered until the widget first becomes visible. The data in the source and css tabs are loaded using an RPC call to the server.

CSS Style Rules

  • .sc-ContentWidget { Applied to the entire widget }
  • .sc-ContentWidget-tabBar { Applied to the TabBar }
  • .sc-ContentWidget-deckPanel { Applied to the DeckPanel }
  • .sc-ContentWidget-name { Applied to the name }
  • .sc-ContentWidget-description { Applied to the description }

onInitialize

public abstract com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget onInitialize()
When the widget is first initialized, this method is called. If it returns a Widget, the widget will be added as the first tab. Return null to disable the first tab.

Returns:
the widget to add to the first tab
